title: Who's the worst stan in Red Velvet? - Quora

response.answer_text: For me it’s Seulgi’s stan First of all, they always bring a topic to fandom and they actually clean them selves They are quietly hate Irene everytime people praise irene baing main dancer They also hate Wendy from the start sine her lines in rv songs is more unlike seulgi They starting to hate Joy too because of the achievements joy havenow adays, more ost, magazine shoot and all And to Yeri most of them hated her because of being social butterfly, like I don’t fucking understand what is the problem about it! This is based on twitter stan! Stanning RV from the start I can see that most of the S Stans are worst
